item.title: IntersectionObserver를 이용한 Javascript
item.description:
<style>
  ul{
    margin-top : 25px;
  }
  .test{
    opacity: 0;
    transition: all 2s;
  }
  .test>img{
    width: 100%;
  }
</style>

item.title: OpenWeatherMap api를 이용한 날씨 예보
item.description:
<style>
    #cityBtn{
        border: none;
        background-color: skyblue;
        border-radius : 10px;
        color : white;
        font-size : 18px;
    }
    #cityBtn:hover{
        background-color : white;
        color : black;
    }
    .weather-result{
        width : 100%;
        text-align: center;
        margin-top : 50px;
    }
    .weather-list{
        width : 100%;
        display : flex;
        justify-content: space-around;
    }
    .weather-icon{
        width: 100px;
    }
    .cityName{
        font-size : 30px;
        font-weight : bold;
    }
    ul{
        margin-top : 30px;
    }
</style>
